title: Patient Care Practical Skills Enhancement: Basic Mathematics Remote Education Workshop for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary-Level Understanding of Basic Arithmetic Operations
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply basic arithmetic operations and statistics to real-life problems (finance, measurement, etc.).
Learners can extract mathematical information from visual materials using digital tools (tablets, projectors).
Learners can collaborate with team members to complete project-based assessment tasks (e.g., budget planning).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
